name: 胡憲倫
objective:
本課程介紹科技論文寫作與報告，課程內容包括科技論文寫作元素介紹 (摘要、介紹、方法、結果、討論、結論) 與撰寫方式，文獻搜尋與整理，報告與發表注意事項，以利環境所碩博士生應用於未來論文撰寫與成果發表。
This class focuses on the Introduction of major elements in technical writing, including abstract, introduction, research methods, results, discussion, and conclusion. Writing grammar, style, and methods to perform literature search and review are also introduced. The main aim of this course is enhancing the ability of graduate students in future thesis writing and research publication.
schedule:
Week 1: General Introduction 
　　General Introduction
　　Homework #1: update and submit your paper (new update should be > 200 words)
Week 2: Chapter 10: What do your observations mean? 
　　Learn how to write the discussion section.
　　Present your HW#1.
　　Homework #2: submit your paper (new update should be > 200 words)
Week 3 (5/31): Chapter 11: How do your results fit into the broader context? 
　　Learn how to write the discussion section.
　　Present your HW#2
　　Homework #3: submit your paper (new update should be > 200 words)
Week 4 (6/7): Chapter 12: How can you describe causes and effects?
　　Learn how to write the discussion section.
　　Present your HW#3
　　Homework #4: submit your paper (new update should be > 200 words)
Week 5 (6/14): Chapter 13: How can you use examples?
　　Learn how to use the example in your paper.
　　Present your HW#4
　　Homework #5: submit your paper (new update should be > 200 words)
Week 6 (6/21): 
Part 1: Chapter 14: What is the Report about in short (writing the abstract)? 
Part 2: Chapter 15: How can we write about others who have helped us? & Chapter 16: How can we write the cover letter to the editor? 
　　Learn how to write the abstract, acknowledgment and cover letter.
　　Present your HW#5
　　Course summary
　　Homework #6: Submit your full paper
scorePolicy:
　　Homework　　　　　　　　　　30 %
　　Teaching and presentation 
(1 teaching, 1 or 2 presentations) 　　　　20 %
　　Class interaction             　　　　　　20 %
　　Report 　　　　　　　　　　　　30 %
　　Attendance　　　　　　　　　　+/-10 %
materials: Wallace, Steve, How to write and submit an academic paper in 18 weeks, 華樂絲語文顧問有限公司，2010
